name: Remove Ads!
description: Remove advertisements on all mobile devices!

name: Extra Beauty!
description: Enable the skin slot, allowing you to disguise your character in an armour!

name: Fast Healing!
description: Gives your mana and health regen a 2.0x multiplier.

name: Great Loot!
description: Gives you a 50% higher change of getting a better loot!

name: New Identity!
description: Allows you to change your name in the character menu!
